hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
cp -r ${LINUX_GIT_DIR} $WORKSPACE
export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:PYTHONPATH export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=/home/linuxregressionmac/flexlm/vector-UBUNTU.lic export VECTORCAST_DIR=$LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR
cd $WORKSPACE ./build.sh --gcov cd build lcov --zerocounters --directory `pwd` ./RunUnitTest.sh
lcov --capture --directory . --output-file=coverage1.info
mkdir tbuild cd tbuild cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ $VECTORCAST_DIR/vpython VcRunTests.py lcov --capture --directory . --output-file=coverage2.info
mkdir coverage cd coverage lcov --add --add-tracefile ../coverage1.info -a ../coverage2.info -o coverage_merged.info genhtml ../coverage_merged.info
